customer_addr:
Lois Howard
20155 Elk Rd.
Princeton, MO 64673

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:25 -
12:40pm on 01-MAR-17.
Inspectors arrived at facility, knocked on residence door, and honked GOV horn. A short time later an occupant
emerged from the residence and informed the inspectors that the licensee was not at home and she was at a place
with no phone reception.
Additional Inspectors
Boone Bonnie, Veterinary Medical Officer
